Only the relatively crystallized entity can reliably draw intelligent energy through the indigo ray for healing and other purposes.

keyPassages.excerpt: When a crystalline structure is formed the elements present in each molecule are bonded in a regularized fashion. Thus the structure is regular and, when fully and perfectly crystallized, has certain properties: It will not splinter or break; it is very strong without effort; and it is radiant.

disease.definition: Physical distortion that manifests when catalyst is not used by the mind or spirit complex, filtering through to the body.
disease.extendedDefinition: The abundance of disease on Earth is symptomatic of widespread inefficient use of catalyst. However, not all illness results from inefficient catalyst use—many positive souls program physical limitation to elicit incarnational lessons. Disease also serves the function of offering the body complex the opportunity to cease viability at the appropriate time, facilitating the end of incarnation.

keyPassages.excerpt: If catalyst is not used by the mind or spirit complex, it will then filter through to the body complex and manifest as some form of physical distortion.
keyPassages.context: Origin of disease in unused catalyst

dual-activated.definition: Service-to-others beings who, upon graduating from third density elsewhere, have incarnated during Earth's transition with a third-density/fourth-density double body in activation.
dual-activated.extendedDefinition: Dual-activated entities are not wanderers because Earth is their fourth-density home planet. Their transitional body can appreciate an increasing influx of fourth-density light without the disruption a third-density body would experience. To some extent, they are consciously aware of fourth-density understandings that third density cannot remember. It is a privilege to incarnate before the full transition, as there is intensive catalyst available for serving others.

keyPassages.excerpt: The purpose of such combined activation is that such entities, to some extent, consciously are aware of those fourth-density understandings which third density is unable to remember due to the forgetting. Thus fourth-density experience may be begun with the added attraction of dwelling in a troubled third-density environment and offering its love and compassion.

energy-center-blockage.definition: The literal blocking of intelligent love/light energy moving through the energy system, caused by distortions in belief, perception, or thought.
energy-center-blockage.extendedDefinition: Blockages may occur in body, mind, spirit, or a combination, manifesting as personality structures, mental/physical/spiritual pain, or ill health. The root cause of blockage is the lack of ability to see the other-self as the Creator—the lack of love. Blockage must be cleared seriatim (in order) from red ray upwards. The final purpose of clearing is to allow the meeting place of outer and inner energies to occur at the indigo-ray vibration, making contact with intelligent infinity.

keyPassages.excerpt: While it is a primary priority to activate or unblock each energy center, it is also a primary priority at that point to begin to refine the balances between the energies so that each tone of the chord of total vibratory beingness resonates in clarity, tune, and harmony with each other energy.
keyPassages.context: The importance of unblocking and balancing

healer.definition: One who offers an opportunity for realignment or healing of energy centers, acting as a catalyst for the one to be healed.
healer.extendedDefinition: The healer does not heal—the healer offers an opportunity for realignment. Healing happens through the one seeking healing, facilitated by the healer's crystallized being and open gateway to intelligent infinity. The healer must first know their own mind, discipline their body, and connect their spirit to intelligent infinity. True healing requires request or calling from the one to be healed.

keyPassages.excerpt: Firstly, the mind must be known to itself. This is perhaps the most demanding part of healing work. If the mind knows itself then the most important aspect of healing has occurred, for consciousness is the microcosm of the Law of One.

initiation.definition: A process whereby the mind/body/spirit complex becomes a purified or initiated channel for the Law of One, crossing a threshold that delineates former experience from the new.
initiation.extendedDefinition: There are many initiations through natural growth patterns (birth, puberty, marriage, old age, etc.). Spiritual initiation requires centering upon seeking the Creator. Through initiation, a deeper recognition of the self is gained, lessons are learned and tested, and distortions no longer needed fall away. Major initiations produce what Ra calls resurrection—experiencing true life.

keyPassages.excerpt: The initiation of the Queen's Chamber has to do with the abandoning of self to such desire to know the Creator in full that the purified instreaming light is drawn in balanced fashion through all energy centers, meeting in indigo and opening the gate to intelligent infinity. Thus the entity experiences true life or, as your people call it, resurrection.

inner-planes.definition: The non-physical portion of third-density experience, in time/space, experienced between incarnations and in non-ordinary states of consciousness.
inner-planes.extendedDefinition: The inner planes contain various subtle planes including the astral, devachanic, and etheric. They are populated with positively and negatively oriented beings who serve as guides and teachers, and lower-level thought-form entities. Entities experience the inner planes between incarnations for review, healing, and planning. The inner planes may also be entered through dreaming and other non-ordinary consciousness.

keyPassages.excerpt: Time/space is no more homogenous than space/time. It is as complex and complete a system of illusions, dances, and pattern as is space/time, and has as structured a system of what you may call natural laws.
keyPassages.context: The structure of the inner planes

law-of-responsibility.definition: The law that requires all newly gained understanding to be put into practice in moment-to-moment experience—each is responsible for what they learn.
law-of-responsibility.extendedDefinition: This law goes into effect in proportion to the increasing ability to grasp the lessons of the density. The closer to the light one seeks to stand, the more the Law of Responsibility goes into effect. When an entity takes responsibility for the totality of life experiences, it empowers progress like the empowering of the call—the second doubles the first, the third doubles the second, and so forth.

keyPassages.excerpt: By the end of the second cycle, the Law of Responsibility had begun to be effectuated by the increasing ability of entities to grasp those lessons which there are to be learned in this density. Each entity was offered many more subtle ways of demonstrating either service towards others or service to self.
keyPassages.context: How the Law of Responsibility develops

teach-learning.definition: The reciprocal, inseparable nature of teaching and learning—to teach is to learn, to learn is to teach.
teach-learning.extendedDefinition: Ra emphasizes that teaching and learning are the same thing. The teacher learns from the act of teaching, and the student teaches through the act of learning. This reciprocity reflects the fundamental unity of all experience. The best teacher is the student who learns, and the best student teaches. Service to others naturally includes this reciprocal dynamic.

keyPassages.excerpt: We learn/teach. We teach/learn. There is nothing else which is of aid in demonstrating the Original Thought except your very being.

magic.definition: The work of the adept at the level of the gateway or indigo ray, through which actions may be accomplished that exceed the known limitations of the illusion.
magic.extendedDefinition: Magic is a sacramental connection fed by the disciplines of the personality. Consciousness is the primary tool and means, though typically facilitated through careful preparation and ritual. The principle behind white magic is to configure stimuli reaching down into the trunk of mind, generating disciplined and purified emotion or love which is both protection and key to the gateway. The heart of white magic is the experience of the joy of union with the Creator.

keyPassages.excerpt: The heart of white magic is the experience of the joy of union with the Creator. This joy will, of necessity, radiate throughout the life experience of the positive adept.
There is no magic greater than honest distortion toward love.

mind-complex.definition: That complex which reflects the inpourings of the spirit and the up-pourings of the body complex, containing feelings, emotions, and intellectual thoughts.
mind-complex.extendedDefinition: The mind has a hierarchical construction like geography. Moving down the tree of mind: conscious feelings and thoughts, intuition at the trunk, then roots progressing through individual unconscious, racial mind, planetary mind, archetypal mind, and cosmic all-mind. The mind contains all things—the disciplines of mind involve identifying both what you approve and disapprove within yourself, then balancing each charge with its equal.

keyPassages.excerpt: The disciplines of the mind involve, first of all, identifying both those things of which you approve and those things of which you disapprove within yourself, and then balancing each and every positive and negative charge with its equal. The mind contains all things. Therefore, you must discover this completeness within yourself.
keyPassages.context: How to work with the mind complex

spirit-complex.definition: The channel or shuttle whereby the inpourings from universal, planetary, and personal sources are funneled into the roots of consciousness, and whereby consciousness may be funneled to the gateway of intelligent infinity.
spirit-complex.extendedDefinition: The spirit complex embodies the fields of force and consciousness which are the least distorted of the mind/body/spirit complex. Its exploration and balancing is the longest and most subtle part of learning. Ra calls the spirit a shuttle, channel, and pathway—the adept calls directly through the spirit to the universe for power. The spirit integrates the upreaching yearning of the mind/body energy with the downpouring of infinite intelligence.

keyPassages.excerpt: This spirit complex is the channel whereby the inpourings from all of the various universal, planetary, and personal inpourings may be funneled into the roots of consciousness, and whereby consciousness may be funneled to the gateway of intelligent infinity through the balanced intelligent energy of body and mind.
keyPassages.context: The function of the spirit complex

keyPassages.excerpt: Imagine the function of the magnet. The magnet has two poles. One reaches up. The other goes down. The function of the spirit is to integrate the upreaching yearning of the mind/body energy with the downpouring and streaming of infinite intelligence.

mixed-contact.definition: A channeling contact of mixed polarity whereby an untuned channel receives both positive and negative communications.
mixed-contact.extendedDefinition: Mixed contact is possible because negatively polarized entities transmit on the same frequency of light as positive ones—the contacts may 'feel' the same to an untuned instrument. Negative polarity can mimic positive, using the same name and giving positive-sounding messages embedded with disguised negative truth. Loss of tuning results from desire for proof, neglect of preparation, or emphasis on specific information over seeking love and light.

keyPassages.excerpt: It is not the specificity of the information which attracts negative influences. It is the importance placed upon it. This is why we iterate quite often, when asked for specific information, that it pales to insignificance, just as the grass withers and dies while the love and the light of the One Infinite Creator redounds to the very infinite realms of creation.

maldek.definition: A former planet, now the asteroid belt, whose third-density population caused planetary disintegration through warfare and service to self.
maldek.extendedDefinition: The third-density population of Maldek had a civilization similar to Atlantis, gaining technology and using it without care for planetary preservation. The escalating devastation caused planetary disintegration. The people were so traumatized they existed in a 'social complex knot, or tangle, of fear' for thousands of years. Eventually, over two billion souls came to Earth in second-density vehicles (Bigfoot) for karmic alleviation.

keyPassages.excerpt: The entities of Maldek had a civilization somewhat similar to that of the societal complex known to you as Atlantis in that it gained much technological information and used it without care for the preservation of their planet, following the ways of warfare and service to self.

mars.definition: A planet that was home to third-density life whose tendencies toward warfare caused the atmosphere to become inhospitable before the end of its cycle.
mars.extendedDefinition: The Confederation aided Mars entities by transferring them to Earth at the start of its third-density experience 75,000 years ago. The transfer was unusual—genetic material was preserved, adjusted, and cloned to Earth. Because the free will of those of Mars had been abridged, Earth's quarantine was stepped up. Ra suggests the conditions of mind for nuclear deployment exist on Earth as they did on Mars.

keyPassages.excerpt: It is the distortion of our vision/understanding that the mind and spirit complexes of those of your people need orientation rather than the 'toys' needing dismantlement, for are not all things that exist part of the Creator? Therefore, freely to choose is your honor/duty.

martyrdom.definition: A form of service in which an entity chooses love unbalanced by wisdom, leading to the giving and expending of self without regard for self-preservation.
martyrdom.extendedDefinition: In the truest sense, martyrdom results in death of self for service. While this path manifests undeveloped understanding of free will, Ra does not imply it has any fault—it is an example of love serving as beacon to many. However, in martyrdom lies the end of opportunity. Jesus exemplified this path perfectly, understanding that the hour had come for that which was his incarnation.

keyPassages.excerpt: We do not imply that this course of unbridled compassion has any fault but affirm its perfection—it is an example of love which has served as beacon to many. For those who seek further, the consequences of martyrdom must be considered, for in martyrdom lies the end of the opportunity.
keyPassages.context: Ra on the perfection and limitation of martyrdom

master-cycles.definition: The 75,000-year master cycle of third density and its three 25,000-year major cycles, at the end of which all are harvested.
master-cycles.extendedDefinition: Third density begins and ends in the span of a master cycle of approximately 75,000-76,000 years. This is divided into three major cycles of approximately 25,000 years each. At the end of each major cycle there is opportunity for harvest. At the end of the master cycle, all are harvested regardless of progress—those who have polarized graduate, those who have not repeat third density elsewhere.

keyPassages.excerpt: This planet has a certain scheduling which is part of the mechanism of the intelligent energy. The appropriate time for such a harvest was approximately 75,000 of your years ago. The cycles move precisely as a clock strikes the hour.

one-original-thought.definition: The single foundational thought from which all creation springs: that all things, all life, all creation is part of one unified existence.
one-original-thought.extendedDefinition: The One Original Thought is the harvest of all previous experience of the Creator by the Creator. As the Creator decides to know Itself, It generates Itself into creation. Each generation of this knowing refines the Original Thought. The Creator does not properly create as much as It experiences Itself. There is nothing else of aid in demonstrating the Original Thought except your very being.

keyPassages.excerpt: The Confederation of Planets in the Service of the Infinite Creator has only one important statement. That statement is: 'All things, all of life, all of the creation is part of One Original Thought.'

The One Original Thought is the harvest of all previous experience of the Creator by the Creator. As It decides to know Itself It generates Itself into that plenum, full of the glory and the power of the One Infinite Creator.

planetary-mind.definition: The collective consciousness of a planetary sphere, including all entities who have experienced evolution therein.
planetary-mind.extendedDefinition: Each planet develops a collective consciousness composed of all the mind/body/spirit complexes who have evolved there. This planetary mind grows through the experiences of its inhabitants and influences the conditions of catalyst available. Earth's planetary mind includes the energy patterns of all who have lived here, contributing to the overall planetary vibration and affecting harvest conditions.

keyPassages.excerpt: The planetary entity is a strong entity not having the necessity of any particular mind/body/spirit complex for its existence or for its action, but it does have its consciousness.
